title: Ezreal Gameplay Preview | League of Legends

embed.description: With a new look and a new W, it's time for a true display of skill.

body: Ezreal is here and I can at least say I like his base look, though I have gripes about some of his skins. His new W, still called Essence Flux seems to be like a few people have guessed a mark that can be triggered by his Q and seemingly his ult too.

replies.body: Also, what is wrong with star guardian? He looks like he has Taric's face plastered over top. None of the skins next to him have that look...

Good call out! We finished a texture pass on SG Ezreal's face after this video was recorded.

https://i.imgur.com/Qp9TLPc.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=EdwinMols,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PFgmQeyJ,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2018-09-24T18:37:08.176+0000)
>
> Good call out! We finished a texture pass on SG Ezreal's face after this video was recorded.
> 
> https://i.imgur.com/Qp9TLPc.jpg

Other than the face, is that model final? I'm asking because the hair is a huge point of contention and has been (for me at least) since the original release of this skin. I love the way the hair looks in the Splash art and other official art but the in-game model for the hair fails to meet expectations. I was hoping that Ezreal's VU would be a second chance for the hair to get fixed but it's not looking like that's the case. [I made a quick edit of what it could look like](https://imgur.com/bbOKhSq)

Now that he'll be coming to the PBE again can you guys _please_ consider taking a second pass at the hair model to make it a little more accurate to the art?
THANK THE HEAVENS! I didn't want him looking like an anime Chucky.
LMFAO. PERFECT COMPARISON!
Can you fix Explorer to be more like old Explorer?  Ezreal looks like a frickin miner now.

how else would u explore caves
unless dressed like a miner
Personally, I prefer when he looked like Indiana Jones

dressed like this:
https://www.leagueofpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Explorer-Ezreal-Splash-Art-league_of_papers.jpg
Gayer than ever
How is he gay. Pls explain.
He is skinny, blond, a show-off, and has great hair. Sexuality aside, he's definitely not the epitome of "manly", so people assume he's gay.

> [{quoted}](name=iiGazeii,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PFgmQeyJ,comment-id=000d00010000,timestamp=2018-09-24T19:39:48.926+0000)
>
> He is skinny, blond, a show-off, and has great hair.

Didn't know I was gay then.

>so people assume he's gay

He wasn't actually saying he, himself, believes Ezreal is gay.  Just that that it's based on dumb stereotypes.
stereotypes that are 100% false lmfao

Ah. 

Too stupid to actually make a good joke.

So you resort to 10 year old homophobia.

Stay stupid League community
we'll make a man outta him..
THEY MADE HIS MODEL EVEN BIGGER!? WHY IS HE TOWERING OVER JHIN!???
ezreal had {{item:2138}} which increase his size
Real question here is, how did Ezreal even get close enough to Jhin for you to see this?
Nooooooooo Frosted Ezreal is so monochromatic nowwwwww. Please bring black the black and silver accents.
Ryze called. He wants his empower damage on Q ability back

I think he needs to be more adventurous explorer and less arrogant rich kid. Players can more indentify with and appreciate the adventurous explorer. He can still be cocky at times, but it should come from his young naive demeanor.
I'd really like to know who that voice actor is, it sounds very familiar, I just cant put my finger on it.

Ezreal old voice actor (don'T know if it's the same guy), also did Jarvan IV and Graves

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kyle_Hebert

Hey Riot while at it, can you guys tell if you kept him for Ez's voice since he's all out about revealing who's he acting .-.
That's definitely not Kyle Herbert. I heard enough of him as Gohan from DBZ to know.
Why was he not used in the VU? Was he busy? I already miss him.

They don't simply bring back the old one. They have auditions (including the old VA if they return) & pick the voice that best fits the new direction of the champ. They probably felt that Herbert wasn't a best fit for this new Ez, which does put an emphasis on him being a young Anime-esque pretty boy. So they went with an actor who could best do that direction.

It's also entirely possible Herbert just couldn't come back or chose not to.
Johnny Test from cartoon network maybe
Pulsefire looks dope asf.

Base is amazing, skins are meh.  Oh well, I got many good years of use out of them anyways =/

His VO is just off imo.  Doesn't feel like Ez anymore really.  Too egotistical and high pitched
Looking good. {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
He's so hot dayum {{sticker:sg-lux}}

_Yikes_.  Ezreal seems like a narcissist or sociopath.  Driven by grandiosity and the constant need for approval, he takes breaks the law, takes reckless risks, and blames others for the consequences.  

He treats a fire that caused millions of dollars in damage and may have maimed or killed countless people as no big deal.  He even blames the nice lady who helped him.  

If anyone died in that fire, then he deserves a life sentence without parole for felony murder.
Isn't everyone in this game a sadistic murderer at heart?

he's so GAY i love it
There is literally nothing gay about this...

Thank you, Terozu. I really don't get what it is about the League community and labeling skinny people as gay. Believe me, I'm quite familiar with Grindr and gay bars, and the bears, daddies, and muscular gym rats outnumber the twinks 4:1.

Meanwhile Varus is literally possessing the joint body of two male lovers and no one says a damn thing because he's got an 8 pack.

I love Ezreal, most of it was the voice and the splash art so I was okay with the in-game model. I like the new look he has but I hate his new voice and lines, he used to be very cocky and arrogant, now he's all that plus a spoiled sounding rich kid. They should have given him the lux treatment and just kept the same voice, atleast that's what I wish would of happened as a Ezreal Enthusiast.
in other word Ez sounds like a fucc boi

I’ve feared this day would come.

His voice is horrendous, just simply isn’t pleasant to listen to. This update has made him too girly in my eyes, and if the type of VO lines like the one at the end of the video will be swarming, then I’m done.

Also, why change the Pulsefire skin again, when it was changed last year? It may look better, but then last year’s efforts were in vain and waste of time, money, and energy. Kyle’s voice is actually so much better than this horror. Please hire Kyle.

But to say something good too… His gauntlet looks good.
Agree about the voiceover, but given that very few have kept their old VA, I doubt Ez will get his back =/
Yes unfortunately. Savour the old while you can. :p

Oh I'm spam playing him from here on out until the update.  Then, hopefully, I'll still enjoy playing him.  I've never fully sympathized with people who have had their favourite champions updated until now.  It is weird knowing that what you've been listening to, looking at, and playing for 6 years is going to change.
They changed explorer :(   {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

yeah now it's called Edge
